item.description:
Join us for an adventurous ride 44 miles roundtrip from the South Dennis Trailhead to Wellfleet Harbor.  Be prepared for a full day of biking fun - we will be doing the entire trail. Bring a lunch to eat on the beach. Message if interested in camping afterwards or carpooling (carpooling not organized by sierra club, but you can always message each other). Local Bike rentals available at  barbsbikeshop.com. Note: If there is 70% or greater chance of rain, we will likely cancel event. Contact: Joe Walz: 508-726-2427; joejoewalz@gmail.com
http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/ccrt.htm. Map:  http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/trails/print/ccrt.pdf
item.how_to_find_us: South Dennis Trailhead Parking lot (refer to map link below)--I will have a Black Ford Fusion with a yakima roof rack

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Cape Cod Rail Trail Bike Trip
